original: Bergman, Bror Mårten Julius, advokat, Åmål, f. 19/3/88 i Nor, Värml. 1., av fabriksäg. Bror Julius B. o. Hanna Lars’Son. G. 22 m. Svea Åsitröm, d. 31. Barn: Lars-Erik f. 23, Anna-Karin 24. — Mogiex. i Växjö 09, stud. i Lund 10, jur. kand. 18. E. o. not. i Svea hovr. 18, tingstjg. i Jösse härads o. Västerb. v. doms. 18-22, adv. i Åmål, stadsfogde i Åmål sed. 27. Tf. borg-mäst. tidvis. Led. av Sv:es advrsamf. sed. 27, ordf. i Åmåls stads hyresnd sed. 42.
translated: Bergman, Bror Mårten Julius, lawyer, born March 19, 1888 in Nor, Värmland, Sweden, first son of factory owner Bror Julius B. and Hanna Lars'Son. Married in 1922 to Svea Åsitröm, died in 1931. Children: Lars-Erik b. 1923, Anna-Karin b. 1924. Graduated from Mogiex in Växjö in 1909, studied at Lund University in 1910, and graduated with a law degree in 1918. Became a junior clerk at Svea Court of Appeal in 1918, then district court clerk in Jösse härad and Västerbotten from 1918 to 1922. Started practicing law in Åmål, where he became city bailiff in 1927 and served as temporary mayor. Became a member of the Swedish Bar Association in 1927 and chairman of the Åmål city rent board in 1942.

structured.name: Bror Mårten Julius Bergman
structured.jobTitle: Member of the Åmål City Rent Board
